properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa papamulanu kshaminchen Prabhu na netramulanu veliginchen Prabhu Yese nannentho preminchen Pranamunu naa korakosagen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Malina vastramulato nenu chedina hrudyamuto nenu kaluvari siluvanu cheran{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova bahu dayalundu neeti nyayamugala devundu saadhuvulanu gaapaadun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mandira Avaranamulo nenu yerooshalemaa nee madyanu naa prabhune stutiyintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova tana swaastyamugaanan bahugaa thana Mahimanu joopinchan bahu priyamuna nan bilachen{/lang-eng}
